title: language
description: A language in SK can be assigned to documents, contacts and templates. When creating new documents, emails or PDF the language is used to select a specific template or language agnostic defaults. A language has many translations.

name.description: The name of the language, shown in the interface

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 50, max is 200

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => code

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
